text: "Water of Love" is a 1978 song by British rock band Dire Straits and is the second single from their debut studio album Dire Straits. It went to number 54 in Australia and number 28 in the Netherlands and did not chart in the United Kingdom. ==References== Category:1978 songs Category:Blues rock songs Category:Dire Straits songs Category:The Judds songs
title: Water of Love
